note.p: Education: Self-educated (according to Andrew Michael Ramsay, he was 18 when he learned to read), he taught himself French, Latin and Mathematics
Career: Discovered by the Duke of Argyll reading Newton's 'Principia', he was encouraged to continue his studies; after the Duke's death lived in poverty.
Sources: Bulloch's Roll; DNB; printed list
References: William S Pierpoint, 'Edward Stone (1702-1768) and Edmund Stone (1700-1768): Confused Identities Resolved' in NR 1997 vol 51 pp 211-217
